name: Loyalty Programs
summary: Structured reward systems that incentivize repeat purchases and ongoing customer engagement.
explanation: Loyalty programs reward customers for continued business, creating switching costs and encouraging repeat purchases. Types include: points systems (earn and redeem), tiered programs (more benefits at higher levels), cashback, exclusive access, and gamification. Effective programs offer: rewards customers actually value, achievable milestones, clear progress visibility, and emotional connection beyond transactions. Loyalty programs work best when they enhance genuine value rather than substituting for itâ€”customers stay for the product, programs reinforce the relationship. For creators, loyalty might manifest as: member-only content, early access to new products, alumni discounts, or recognition in community. The goal is making customers feel valued and increasing lifetime value.

books.title: The Loyalty Leap by Bryan Pearson
